column2: The Coffee Review is committed to preserving your privacy. The following statement discloses the information gathering and dissemination practices for the CoffeeReview.com website and the Coffee Review Marketplace.

The Coffee Review is committed to preserving your privacy. The following statement discloses the information gathering and dissemination practices for the CoffeeReview.com website and the Coffee Review Marketplace.

Use of Your Personal and Non-Personal Information. Except as disclosed in this policy, we do not sell or disclose information that identifies our guests personally or makes it possible for other parties to contact them directly without our guests' consent.
